verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> that <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was come <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that were <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1252>contended<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>
saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou wentest <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> didst eat <S%G4906>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> rehearsed the matter from the <S%G756>beginning,<s%> and <S%G1620>expounded<s%> it by <S%G2517>order<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2445>Joppa<s%> <S%G4336>praying:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1611>trance<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3705>vision,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G2597>descend,<s%> as it had <S%G5613>been<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3607>sheet,<s%> let <S%G2524>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G746>corners;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> even <S%G891>to<s%> me: <S%G1700><s%>

Upon <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> when I had fastened mine <S%G816>eyes,<s%> I <S%G2657>considered,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> fourfooted <S%G5074>beasts<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> wild <S%G2342>beasts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>air.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> Arise, <S%G450><s%> <S%G4074>Peter;<s%> <S%G2380>slay<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5315>eat.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> Not <S%G3365>so,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3956>nothing<s%> <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> hath at any <S%G3763>time<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1537>again<s%> <S%G1208><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> that call not thou <S%G2840>common.<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4771><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> was <S%G1096>done<s%> three <S%G5151>times:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> were drawn <S%G385>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1824>immediately<s%> there were <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> already <S%G2186>come<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2252>was,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>bade<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> go <S%G4905>with<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1252>doubting.<s%> <S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2064>accompanied<s%> <S%G4862><s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G435>man's<s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> he <S%G518>showed<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> which <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G649>Send<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2445>Joppa,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> call <S%G3343>for<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> whose surname <S%G1941>is<s%> <S%G4074>Peter;<s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G2980>tell<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> I <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> that he <S%G3004>said,<s%> John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Forasmuch <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2470>like<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> he <S%G2532>did<s%> unto <S%G2254>us,<s%> who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> I, that I <S%G1415>could<s%> <S%G2967>withstand<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> they held their <S%G2270>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G686>Then<s%> <S%G1065>hath<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> they which were scattered <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G575>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2347>persecution<s%> that <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> <S%G1330>traveled<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G5403>Phoenicia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> to <S%G3367>none<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> unto the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2953>Cyprus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G3748>which,<s%> when they were <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1675>Grecians,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> and <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> tidings of these things <S%G3056>came<s%> <S%G4012><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G191><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they sent <S%G1821>forth<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> that he should <S%G1330>go<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2425>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> was <S%G4369>added<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5019>Tarsus,<s%> for to <S%G327>seek<s%> Saul: <S%G4569><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus,<s%> and <S%G4591>signified<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that there <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G1510>be<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>dearth<s%> <S%G1909>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3625>world:<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2532><s%> came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> in the days <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2531>to<s%> his <S%G5100>ability,<s%> <S%G2141><s%> <S%G3724>determined<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1519>relief<s%> <S%G1248><s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> which <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> Judea: <S%G2449><s%>
